channel.title: CIBR talk on Jun-Liszt Li
channel.description: Recent content in CIBR talk on Jun-Liszt Li

item.title: Tailoring the brain connectivity atlas: reconstruction and revision of large-scale microscopic brain atlas
item.description: In complex biological systems, it is often the structure of the object of study that determines its function. This is also true for neural network systems. In order to understand the complexity of the structure of animal brain networks and their potential functions, brain mapping is one of the important goals in the current brain project.
